planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.
b. Move toward closest goal. If would stop on a navpoint and passed through a planet not more than 2 spaces - return to that planet. Do not stop on Maelstrom.
action: If at cargo destination, deliver it.
Buy a cargo card and place a goal token on card's destination.
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. If at job destination, complete it.
c. Spend credits 8 000 to gain 1 fame.
special: Discard top cards from bounty and luxury market decks. Then shuffle this AI deck.
